name: Commandos Vs Robots Real Defence War Survival Game
name_original: Commandos Vs Robots Real Defence War Survival Game
description:
Army of Angry Robots destroy of most important military defence base in grand shara desert, many soldiers are in prison of those furious robots, this is really important mission of rescuing our troops in prison ,so we launched this important mission and we need your help to kill all those enemy robots.

Our many cobra helicopters destroyed in previous attempts to rescue our soldiers,so it last attempt,be careful.

Instructions

Pick up the weapons around you , we have dropped some advanced guns like AK47 , sniper guns , pistols and medical kits also.

After the heli landed on target location immediately start your mission, alot of ammo available for you to complete this mission.
